description:

description:
The 2014 Old Arch Rd #2 in Norristown, PA is a unique property for several reasons. First, the house has been fully renovated, which means that the interior has been updated with new hardwood and laminate flooring, as well as newer appliances in the kitchen. This means that the house is move-in ready and buyers won't have to spend additional money or time on upgrades or repairs.
Second, the house features both a fireplace in the living room and a wood-stove in the basement, which could be a desirable feature for buyers who enjoy the warmth and ambiance of a traditional fireplace or wood-stove.
Third, the den in this house could be used as a 4th bedroom, as it has a door and closets, which is a unique feature that could be very appealing to potential buyers who need extra living space or who want the flexibility to use the space as a bedroom or a home office.
Finally, the full unfinished basement with a low ceiling provides ample space for storage or additional living space with the potential for buyers to finish the basement as per their needs and preferences.
Overall, the combination of the renovation, multiple heating options, a potential 4th bedroom, and a full unfinished basement with ample space makes this property unique and highly desirable for buyers looking for a move-in ready home in Norristown, PA.
